ygData.subject: Re: Bard envy
ygData.msgSnippet: I wouldn t say that you have to remember that bards as it is can wear plate and they can not. Without rubicite it would be nice for them to get some good armor
ygData.messageBody:
I wouldn't say that you have to remember that bards as it is can wear plate
and they can not. Without rubicite it would be nice for them to get some
good armor at about the level a bard can.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: Bard <dabard@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, October 13, 1999 10:22 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Bard envy


>From: "Bard" <dabard@...>
>
><SNIP>
>>> Yep, it's true. Rangers and Rogues in particular are complaining up a
>storm about how good the
>>> bard armour is compared to theirs.
>Rogues I can understand, but Rangers!?! I don't mean to gripe (well, yes I
>do ;p ), but have any of them taken a look at the armor and 1H Slash lists
>at Allakhazam's site? Just go by and look at all the nifty Ranger-only
>items there. Gosh, let's see... how many bard-only weapons are listed
>there? NONE :oP Bard only armor (pre-patch) 1, and that's from PoF.
>Ranger's have no room to gripe. Period. (IMO)
>
>-=B=-
>
>>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@...
with the subject lol.
>
